list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a flat dish, typically circular and made of china, from which food is eaten or served.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he pushed his empty plate to one side and sipped his wine
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh đẩy đĩa trống của mình sang một bên và nhấm nháp rượu của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: dishes, bowls, cups, and other utensils made of gold, silver, or other metal.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: an exhibition of the plate belonging to the college
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một triển lãm của tấm thuộc trường đại học

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thin, flat sheet or strip of metal or other material, typically one used to join or strengthen things or forming part of a machine.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he underwent surgery to have a steel plate put into his leg
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ông đã trải qua phẫu thuật để có một tấm thép cho vào chân anh ta

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thin, flat organic structure or formation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the fused bony plates protect the tortoise's soft parts
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các tấm xương hợp nhất bảo vệ các phần mềm của rùa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of the several rigid pieces of the earth's lithosphere which together make up the earth's surface.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tấm đại dương Thái Bình Dương

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sheet of metal, plastic, or some other material bearing an image of type or illustrations from which multiple copies are printed.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the correct alignment of the plates in four-color printing
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: sự liên kết chính xác của các tấm in bốn màu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thin piece of plastic molded to the shape of a person's mouth and gums, to which artificial teeth or another orthodontic appliance are attached.
a thin piece of metal that acts as an electrode in a capacitor, battery, or cell.
cover (a metal object) with a thin coating or film of a different metal.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she had already taken the coin to a jeweler to be plated
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đã lấy đồng xu cho một thợ kim hoàn được mạ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: serve or arrange (food) on a plate or plates before a meal.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: overcooked vegetables won't look appetizing, no matter how they are plated
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: rau quả quá chín sẽ không nhìn ngon miệng, bất kể chúng được mạ như thế nào

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: score (a run or runs); cause (someone) to score.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Matt Wignot plated two of Clarkson's runs
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Matt Wignot Mạ hai lần chạy của Clarkson

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: inoculate (cells or infective material) on to a culture plate, especially with the object of isolating a particular strain of microorganisms or estimating viable cell numbers.
